messManagementSolution: Your one-stop solution for mess management.
loginDescription: Select your role and sign in to your account.
createAccountToManage: Create an account to manage your mess subscription.
registerDescription: Fill in the details below to create your account.
oneTimePayment: Make a one-time payment for your meal.
paymentDetailsDescription: Enter your details to proceed with the payment.
applicationUnderReview: Your application is currently under review by the mess manager. You will be able to log in once your account has been approved.
studentDashboard_description: Here's a quick overview of your mess account.
studentDashboard_welcomeDescription: Navigate using the sidebar to view the weekly menu, check your dues, or raise a complaint.
weeklyMenu_description: Here is the food menu for the upcoming week.
weeklyMenu_notSet: The menu for this week has not been set yet.
myDues_description: View your monthly payment history and upcoming dues.
myDues_cardDescription: A record of all your monthly mess fees.
complaints_description: Have an issue? Let us know, and we'll address it.
complaints_newComplaintDescription: Please provide as much detail as possible. You can attach one image.
complaints_historyDescription: View your past complaints and manager replies.
complaints_noComplaints: You haven't submitted any complaints yet.
suggestions_description: Have an idea to improve the mess? We'd love to hear it.
suggestions_newSuggestionDescription: Share your thoughts on how we can make things better.
suggestions_placeholder: I think it would be great if...
suggestions_historyDescription: View your past suggestions and manager replies.
suggestions_noSuggestions: You haven't submitted any suggestions yet.
messRules_description: Please adhere to the following rules and regulations.
messRules_noRules: No mess rules have been set by the manager yet.
managerDashboard_description: Oversee and manage all mess operations from here.
managerDashboard_welcomeDescription: Use the sidebar to manage student applications, update the menu, and view financials.
studentManagement_description: Approve new student applications and view all registered students.
studentManagement_pendingDescription: Review and act on new student registrations.
studentManagement_approvedDescription: List of all active students in the mess.
studentManagement_rejectedDescription: List of all rejected student applications.
menuManagement_description: Set the weekly menu for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
menuManagement_cardDescription: Fill in the items for each meal. The changes will be visible to all students immediately.
feedback_description: Review and respond to student complaints and suggestions.
financials_description: Track student dues and guest payments.
financials_duesDescription: Manage and track monthly payments from all students.
financials_guestsDescription: A log of all one-time payments made by guests.
settings_description: Configure general settings for the mess.
settings_cardDescription: Set the default monthly fee and mess rules for all students.
settings_rulesPlaceholder: Enter mess rules here. Each rule on a new line.
broadcast_description: Send an announcement to all students.
broadcast_newDescription: The message will be displayed on every student's dashboard.
broadcast_messagePlaceholder: e.g., Mess will be closed tomorrow for maintenance.
broadcast_historyDescription: A log of all past announcements.
notes_description: A private space for your to-do list and reminders.
notes_cardDescription: Add items to your personal checklist.
notes_placeholder: e.g., Order vegetables for next week
adminDashboard_welcomeDescription: Monitor manager activities and ensure service quality.
adminDashboard_info: You can view all student complaints and manager responses from the sidebar.
allComplaints_description: Oversee all complaints and manager responses for quality assurance.
allComplaints_logDescription: A complete history of all student complaints.
